intro.title: My Journey
intro.content: Welcome to my story! Here's a glimpse into my professional journey and the experiences that have shaped who I am today.

experiences.title: Software Engineer – AWS AI Science Team
experiences.story: My first experience building a WebAgent — learning how to design, train, and evaluate it within a large-scale system at Amazon AI. This was where the idea of scalable agent reasoning truly began to take shape.

experiences.title: AI Product Engineer – PingAn AI Lab
experiences.story: My first role in fintech, working with a computer vision team to develop a multimodal fraud detection system that combined AI infrastructure and business impact.
highlights: Collaborated with CV and NLP scientists to build risk signal expansion

experiences.title: Product Manager – Tencent Ads
experiences.story: Worked on embedding-based collaborative models to improve ad targeting and multi-objective optimization across Tencent's advertising platform.
highlights: Deployed embedding collaborative models for ad relevance optimization
Enhanced CTR-ROI balance through multi-objective modeling
Drove cross-team iteration between algorithm and UX groups

experiences.title: Product Analytics Scientist – ByteDance
experiences.story: Built the first commercial analytics dashboard for TikTok's monetization team, transforming fragmented data into real-time business insight.
highlights: Developed end-to-end BI diagnostic dashboard for large-scale ad analytics
Streamlined data pipelines enabling real-time performance visualization
Enabled data-driven monetization decisions for Douyin Ads

education.title: Master of Science in Information Systems
education.story: Focused on building intelligent systems at the intersection of software engineering and AI. Courses include Machine Learning, Advanced LLM, Data Science, and Full-Stack Web Development.
education.achievements: Graduate Teaching Assistant for Data Science & Career Management courses

education.title: Master of Science in Education
education.story: Explored human–computer interaction, cognitive psychology, and experimental design — a foundation that continues to influence how I think about AI and user experience.
education.achievements: Research focus on cognitive modeling and interaction design
